text: == Events == * Louis VII surrenders to Pope Celestine II and so received a blessing from the pope * March 12 — Pope Lucius II becomes Pope over Pope Celestine II as the 166th pope. * December 24 — County of Edessa is beaten by Zengi (see Siege of Edessa). * Montauban, France, is started. * Normandy comes under Angevin control through Geoffrey of Anjou. * Giordano Pierleoni starts the revolutionary Commune of Rome. * Manuel I Comnenus brings Raymond, Prince of Antioch, under Byzantine influence. * The Priory in Lesmahagow is started by Benedictine monks. == Births == * Bohemund III of Antioch (d. 1201) == Deaths == * March 8 — Pope Celestine II * September — Geoffrey de Mandeville, 1st Earl of Essex
